index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing Funding Agreement No. 4 with the United States of America for a temporary loan, definitive loan and a capital grant to aid in financing the City's Neighborhood Development Program (Nos. Wash. A-2-1 Leschi; Wash. A-2-2 South Park; Wash. A-2-3 North Greenwood.
